verses.1: Topa aw, na biakinn sungah kua om ding ahi hiam? Na mual siangtho tungah kua teeng ding ahi hiam?
verses.2: Paubaang loin gamta-in, a manin na sem a, lungsim tak a gen mi,
verses.3: mi gensia loin, a lawmte tungah siatna bawl lo a, a veengte a mawhsak lo mi,
verses.4: migilote thusim lo a, ahi zongin Topa a zahtakte a pahtawi mi, ama nat nading nangawn ah a ciampel lo mi,
verses.5: ama sum a meetin a kha lo, thutang mite a langpan lo, golhguk a la lo mite teeng ding uh hi. Hih bangin a gamtate pen liing ngei lo ding hi.
